column4: it's interesting, using compiz-fusion as the compositing manager, if you enable the the desktop wall feature with the 'edge flip move' option enabled, moving a window to the edge shifts the virtual desktop over and moves the mouse to the other side of the screen, along with the window you're dragging
but if you drag a stickynote to the edge of the screen like that, and onto the other virtual desktop, your mouse is still holding the window, but the window has dissappeared
dropping it there makes it completely disappear from view
